text: Villain is a 1971 British LGBT crime drama movie. It was directed by Michael Tuchner.Villain at BFI Screenonline The movie is based on the 1968 novel The Burden of Proof by James Barlow. Actors include Richard Burton, Ian McShane, Nigel Davenport, Joss Ackland, Donald Sinden, Fiona Lewis, Tony Selby and John Hallam.
